par bsgom pa bsgom ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnam pa la bsgom ba bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi skad pa rnam bar ba sgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi ye
rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dbang bo rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom ra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na khyang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom pa/ shes rab kyi pa'ol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam rnam par bsgol
pa ba sgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid kyi ting de 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
ji ltar namtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzani rnam par bsgom pa bsgom// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgron
ba gsar ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa la sgom kha/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar namathar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dag rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa dang bca sa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam
bar bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin la bsgom ba lags/ jaltar n rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa bags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal
'phags bab bden pa rnam bar ba sgom pa bsgom la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'gyur pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgo mo ba/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam bar bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
ba lags/ ji ltar nalam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
bsgom pa// shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
na'agog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gas/ ji ltar n lam shes pa rnam par bsgrom ba bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgos pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gas/ ji ltar narjes su
'gre kho shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na'adris la shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa bsgom pa lags/ jiltar na sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
bsgom khra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar nasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pabasgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom ba bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam/
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom b.lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom
pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gag/ ji ltar/
tsha/ na stong pa nyid stong ba nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar nAchan po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom la//
shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ jiltar n don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom ba ba sgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas
'tsha stong ba nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom pa/ shesarab kyi pha ro'o tu
zla phun pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par khasgom pa bsgom khra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gas/ ji ltar na thog ma dang thamamadapa
stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na do ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par la sgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
zla phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pakhasgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid
rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
lab sgom pa lags/ jiltar nam dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gas/ jiltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par
ba sgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
ji ltar n dngos lord pa'i de bzhadi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji lta na mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
ba shes rab kyi 'ol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tadri nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'gas/ ji ltar n
gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa sgom pa lags/ ji ltar n mi'ajigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol ta phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa sgom pa la lags/ ji ltar na byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgrom ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la gas/ ji ltar na snying
rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'gas/ ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam bar ba sgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shesarab kyil rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom

sgyu kha ba sgom la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gas ( ji ltar n dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub
rnam par bsgomab kha sgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar n la mgyi rnam pa shes pa 'de rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi lA rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa khag
ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong
b rnam bar ba sgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa bsgom pa lags '! shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya kha bam po nyis brgya re dgu pa//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po yodacis bya/
bar mi bsgom mo/ tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo
rnam bar ng shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ mig dngos po yod cis bya ba'am bsgomano// rna pa dngos po yod ces bya ba'am bsgomamo// sna dades po yod ces bya bar mi
bsgom mo// lcad ngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yi da dngos po yod ces bya ba'am bsgom mo// gzugs dngos po yod ces
khyu bar mi bsgromamo// sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgomamo// dri dngos po yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo/ ro dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ rig dngos po yod/
ces bya bar mi la sgom mo// chos dngos re yod ces bya ba ma bsgomamo// mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomamo/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod/
ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ sna'i rnam par nga shis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi rnam par shes
ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// mig gi 'dus te rig pa dngos po yod ces bya bar
mi bsgom mo// rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sna'i 'dus turag pa dngos po yod ces bya bar la bsgom mo// lca' ba dus da reg pa dngos bo yod/
ces bya bar mi bsgomamo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod cas bya bar ma bsgom mo// tshug gi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos bo yod pas khyabar mi bsgom mo/ rna ba' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba dngos kho tshod ces bya ba mi bsgomamo// lca'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po
yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te'og pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar ma khasgom mo/ chu'i khas
dngos bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgoma'o// mo'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rlung gi khams dngos po yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo// nam mkha'i khams dngos
[o]kho yod cas bya bar ma bsgom mo// rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi ba sgomamo// rtenacing 'bre la par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ma
rig pa dngos lo yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi ba sgo mamo/ rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ming dang gzugs
dngos po yodatsas pya bar mi bsgom mo// skye mched drug dngos po yod cig bya bar mi bsgomamo// reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ tshor ba dngos kho lo datsos bya bar
mi bsgom mo/ srod pa dngos po yod ces bya ba'am bsgom mo/ len pa dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// srid pa dngos bo yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// skyo ba dngos po
yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo/ klung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dor ba dngos ko lod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
bsam gtan dang po dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom me// bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po yod ces bya ba ma bsgom
mo bsam gtan bzhi pa dngos bo yo datsas kha khar mi bsgom mo// bams pa dngos bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// snying rje dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dga'
kha dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// btang snyoms dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomago/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
dngos bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug
kha dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug la dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo/ sangasargyus rjes su dran pa dngos
po yod ces bya bar mi bsgoma'o// chos rjes su dran pa dngos pa yid ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar m bsgom mo// tshul khrims rjes
su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya ba mi bsgrom mo/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya par mi bsgom mo// lhurjes su dran pa dngos po yodatsas bya bar mi bsgom mo// skyo ba
rjes su dran pa dngos po yodatsas khyi la mi bsgom mo// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dngos bo yod cis khyabar mi bsgom mo// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod pas bya bar
mi bsgom mo/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos kho yod ces bya bar ni khosgom mo/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos bo yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dngos
bo yod ces bya bar ma ba sgomamo// kha dag med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar ma ba sgomamo// ma lcag ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya ba'am bsgomago/ dngos po//
med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ bdag ga 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bosgom mo/[¬∞ ]gal sa can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom/
go grog gi'i du nga gis dngos bo yod pas bu bar ma bsgom mo// skyo ba'i 'du shes drangos po yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo/ gso ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
bsgom// skyes bu'i 'du shes dgo bo yod ces bya bar n bu sgom mo// gang thug gi 'du shes dngos de yod cig bya ba'i tshabasgom mo// shod can gyi 'du shes dngos po yodacas/
kha par mi bsgom/'di bdag gi 'du shes dades bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// byed pa bo 'du shes dngos la yod ces bya bar ma la sgoms/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes dngos
bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// shes la kho'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ ma bod ba po'i du shes dngos bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtag pa'i
'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// bde ba' 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo// sdug la 'badungashes dngos kho yid cig bya bar mi bsgom mo//
[@]// bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya ba'u tsha ba sgomano// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// yang dag par spong ba rnams
dngos po yo da rus bya bar mi bsgomamo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod pas bya bar ma pa sgom mo// dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stobs
rnams dngos bo yod ces bya ba ra ma bsgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya par ma bsgomaso/ lam dngos bo yod ces bya bar ma bsgrom mo// stong pa/
kyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mtshan ma med pa'i tod de 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar ma de sgom mo// smon pa med pa'i tod de 'dzin dngos po yodatsas
bu bar m bsgom mo// rnam par thar pa brgyud dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomamo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
rtog pa dang bcu sa dpyod pa dang bya cus pa'i ting de 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtog pamed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nga 'dzin dngos po yod ces pa bar ma bsgom mo//
rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting de 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya par mi bsgom mo// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mal sgom me// kun 'khyud pa
'phags pa'i bden pa dang des po yod ces bya bar mi la sgoma'o// 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod pas bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos bo yod/
sa bya bar mi bsgoma'o/ sdug bsngal shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar grwa bsgom mo// kun 'byung ba shes pa dngos bo yod ces bya bar mi khasgomamo// 'gag pa shes pa dngos/
bo yod ces bya bar ma de sgom mo// lam shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomAmo// zad pa zhes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo// ma skye ba shes pa dngos po yod
ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ chos shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ kun rdzob shes pa dngos po yod/
ces bya bar ma pa sgomam// 'dris pashis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yodacas bya bar ma bsgomano// sbyin pa'i be rol tu phyin pa
dngos bo yod ces bya ba'am bsgom mo/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod cig bya bar mi ba sgomam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dadas bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgol
mo brtson 'grus kyi pa'ol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ kha sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin bdangos po yod ces bya ba bamang sgom mo// nad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya par ma pa sgom mo// khyi stod pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar ma ba sgom mo//
phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med nas bya bar mi bsgomamo// chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar m bsgomamo// don
'gi dam la stong pa nyid dngos bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgomamo// 'dus byas stong pa de dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'dus ma byas stong nyid dngos po yod cis bya ba ma bsgom mo//
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces pa bar ma be sgomam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos bo yod ces bya ba'am bsgomalo// dor bamed pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya
gar na bsgoms// rad ba zhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po
yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos bo yod ces bya bar ma bsgomamo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos/
po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomamo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomamo/ mngon par shes pa drug dngos bo yod ces bya bar bsgom mo// ting nga
'dzin tham sa cad dngos po lod ces bya bar ma'i sgom mo// gzus kyi sgo thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bo sgom mo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stebs bcu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
bsgomano// mi'ajigs pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya ba'am bsgom mo// so so la da dag par rig pa bzhi dengos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomamo/ khyams pachen bo dngos po yod ces bya ba'am bsgomamo// snying rjechen po dngos po yod cag bya bar mkhisgomamo// rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mkhasgom mo// lan cig phyi'i 'od pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya khrar ma bsgom mo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod rtsis bya ba'am bsgom
mo dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mkhasgom mo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgomamo//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spungs pa dngos po yod ces bya bang ma bsgom mo//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi phatu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la kha sam go tan rgya bkol tu phyin pa bsgom
bamed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
bamed do// dngosabo'abadu shes can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po' 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa mad do// dngos po'i
'du shes can l nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngosabo'i 'du shes can la phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pamad do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do//
dngos po'i 'du nga shas can la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do/ dngos po' dungashes can la chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pamed do// dngos po' 'dushes can la don dam pa stong
pa nyid bsgom po med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dusakhyas stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus mkhyas stong pa nyid sgom pa med do// dngos po'i
'du shesacan la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la thog ma dang thamamad pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos pob 'i dushesacan la rang bzhin stodapanyid bsgom pa mdado// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgoms
mdado dngos po'i ging shas can la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos kho'i 'du
shas can la dngos bo med pa stong ba nyid la sgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'dungashas can la do bo nyidi stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos bo mdu pa'i dol
nyidistod pa nyid bsgom pa mad do// dngos po'i'adu shas can la mngon par shes pa drug bsgom pa midado// dngos po' 'du shes can la ting de 'dzin thams cad la sgom pa med do//
dngos bo'i 'du shes ca na la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'akhridu shes can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa mad do// dungos bo'i 'du shes can/
la mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shesacan la so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa mad do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom/
ba mad do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la khams pa chen po bsgom pa mdado// dngos po'i 'du shesacan la snying rje chen po bsgom pa med do// dngos po' 'du shes can la rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa yod do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i bus pu bsgom ba med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
'a// bsgomal mdado// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dgra bcom pa nyid bsgomapa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'du byang chub bsgom pamedado// dngos
bo'i 'du shes can l lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shesacan la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen la 'di bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can
la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba bsgom pa mad do// daci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dngos po la/ 'din bdag go zhes bya par
mtha'aganyis la chags te/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ nangastong pa nyid dang/ bya stong
ba nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyidi stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyidedang/ don dam pa stod pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyidadang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
dang mthub las 'das pa stong pa nyidi dang/ thog ma dang tha mamed pa stong pa nyid dad/ der ba 'dra ba stod pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stod ba nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid/
dad rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang/ mi dmags ba stongaranyid dang/ dngos bo med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/
0mngon par shes pa drug dang/ tadi de 'dzin thams cud dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang
dag par 'ag pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen bo dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras budang/ lan cig phyir
'od ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir ma 'od pa'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes patod dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang//
bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang da la/ 'di ni bdag ga zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur/sa/ gang mtha' gnyis la chags pa
la ni thar pa med de/ deci'i phyir zhin/ rang 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la ni/ sbyin pa'i ng med/ tshul khrims kyang med/ bzod pa'i ng med/ brtson ba grus
kyang med/ bsam gtan yang mad/ shes rab kyang med/ 'am yang med/ yi shes kyang mad/ 'thob pa'i ng med/ mngon par rtogs pa'i ng med/ mthun pa'i bzod
pa'i ng med/ gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa med/ tshor babad yongs su shes pamed/ 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam
la@#// par shas la'ang yo ngas su shes pa med/ mig kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba dang yongs su shes ba med/ sna' nga yongs su shes pa mdu/ lce'ang
yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyang yodas su shes pa med/ yid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sgru'ang yongs su shes pa med/ dri'ing
gongs su shes pa med/ robad yodas su shes pa med/ rig kyang yongs su shes pa mad/ chos kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pa
mad rna ba'i rnam par shes par yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i rnam bar ngashes pa'i ng yongs su shes pa mad/ lus kyi
rnam par shes pa byung yongs su shes khamad/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pamed/ migagi 'dus te reg pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
rab d yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i bdus rag pa 'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus tarig la'ang go dos su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus rig 'bang yongs su gas
ba med yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ng yongs su shes pamed/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dusaM te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
gis chad/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen sa gnas te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ya pa med/ nam mkha'i khams kyang masajakyang yongs su shes pamed/
gnad yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bcud yongs su shes pamed/ lcab 'dus pa rig ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus te
ga pa'i rkyen gyisatshon pa'i ng yongs su shes ba med/ yid kyi 'das te rig pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba dang yongs su shes pamed/ sa'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chu'i kham
kyang yodas su shes pa mad/ ma'i khams kyang yongs su shes ba med ( rlung gi khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ nam mkha'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par
shes pa'i khams kyang yongs su shes bamad/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ ma rig pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pamed/
rnam par shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ ming dang gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skye mched dus kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rig pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ tshor
ba'ang yongs su shes pa mad/ srog pa'i ng yodas sungs pamed/ len pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ srid pa dang yongs su shes pa med/ skye ba'ang yongs su shes pa med
khongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i du yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ byams pa'i ng yongs su
shes pa med/ snying rje'ang yongs su shes pa med/ dga' ba'ang yongs su shes pa mad/ btang snyoms kyang yongs su shes pa med/ nam mkha' mthu' yas skye mched kyi snyoms
bar 'jug pa'i ng yongs su shes pamed/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ng yongs su shes pa mad cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa

'ang lo ngas su shes ratshad/'du shes mda' dung shasamadamin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ng yongs su shes pachad/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ chos rjes su dran pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ dge 'dug/
rjes su dran pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ tshul khrims rjesasu dran pa'i ng yongs su shes pa mad/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ lha rdzas su dran pa'i ng yongs su
shes pa mad/ skyo brjes su dran pa'i ng longs su shes pa med/ dbugs phyin ng du rgyu brjes su dran pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa 'di yongs su shes pa mad/
lus kyi rnam parjes su dran pa'i ng yongs su shes pa mad/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa mad/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pamed/ bdag med pa'i
'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang longs su shes pa med/ dngos po mad pa'i gdung shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag cag 'du shes skya pa yongs su shes/
pa mdasanus can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa mad/ srogag 'dushes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skyo ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gso ba'i 'du shes kyang
yongs su shes pa ma ra/ skyes bu'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gang zag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ shed can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/
shid bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa mad/ byed pa po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa mad/ shes pa bo 'badu shes
kyang yongs su shes bamed/ mthong ba po babadu shes kyang yongs su shes pa ma da/ rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bde ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/
sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams kyang yongs su shis pamed/ yang dag par spong pa
rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams kyang yongs su shes pa mad/ dbang bo rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ stobs rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/
[zl ]// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang khongs su shes pa med/ lam yang yongs su shes pa med/ stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzinakyang yongs su shes pamed/ mtshan
mamad ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa mdu/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par thar pa 'ad yongs su shes pamed/ mthar gyis kha/nas
ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting de 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rtog pa med la dad btsan gyi ting
de 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/
blo kun 'abyung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bdenupa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ lam 'phags pa steng den pa'i ng yodas su shes pa 'ad/
sdug bsngal shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ kun 'byung ba shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ 'gog pa shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pamed/ lam shes la' nga yongs su shes
bsod/ zad pa shes pa 'ad yodasasu shes pa mad/ mi skye ba shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ chos shes pa'i ng yodas su shes pa med/ rjes su 'gro ba shes la'ang yongs su
ba'i shes pa med/ kun rdzob shes pa'i ng yongs su shes pamed/ 'dris pa shis pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i ng longs su shes pa med/ sbyin pa'i phurol tu phyin
ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng yongs su shes pamed/ brtson 'grus kyipa re tu
phyin kha'ang yongs su shes pamed/ bsam gtan gyi pha ro'o tu phyin pa'i ng yongs su shes pa med/ shes rab kyi pha ro'o tu phyin pa'i ng yongs su shes pa mad nang stong pa nyid kyang
yongs su shes pa med/ phyi stong ba nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ phyi nang stong pa nyidakyang yongs su shes pamed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes ba mad/ chen po stod
pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ don dam lnga stong ba nyid kyang yongs su shesalamed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid klud yongs su shasang med/ 'dusam byas stong pa nyidakyang yongasasu
shes pa med/ mtha' las 'das pa stod pa nyidakyad yongs su shes pa med/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong panyid kyang yongs su shes pa madra/ dor bsad pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs
su shes pa mod/ rang bzhin stod pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chos thams cad stong panyid kyang yongs su shes pamed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes/
ba med/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyidekyang yongs su shes pa med/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang longs su/
shes pa med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mdon par shes pa drug kyang yongs su shes pa med/ tad de 'dzin thams cad kyang yodas su
shes pa med/ gzu sakyi sgo thams cad kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i stobs btsu'ad yongs su shes pa med/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang yongs su shes pa mad/
so so la da dag par rig pa bzhi'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyang yongs su shes pa med/ byams pa chen po 'ang yongs su shes pa med/ snying
rje chen po'ang yongs su shes pa med/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'adu yongs su shes pa med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'dra sa khub nga yongs su shes pa mad/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu'ang yongs su shes pa med/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rang byang chub kyang yongs su shes pa med/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa
mad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'ang yodas su shes pa mdan/ de thar par 'gyu/
ba lta la/ sa bod gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po mchis shes gyi ba naci lags/ dngos bo ma mchis shes bgyi ba'ici'i gas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal// rab 'byor gnyasi ni dngos po yod pa'o// mi gnyis ldan dngos po med pago gsol pa b.rom ldan 'das gnyis shes bgyi ban ji lta bu lags
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ 'du shes kyi 'du shesan gnyis so// 'du byed kyi
'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// migagi 'du shas naganyis so// rna ba'i bdu gsani gnyis so// sna'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i 'du
shas ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'du shes ni gnyis su// yid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sgra'i 'du shesanu gnyis so// dri'i 'du shesan
gtas so// ro'i 'du shesanaganyis so// rag gi 'du shes ni gnyis so// chos kyi 'du shesanugs so// mag gi rnam par shesapa'i 'du shasan gnyis so/rna ba'i rnam
bar shes pa'i 'du shes ni gzhis so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes na gnyis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes
ni gnyis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes naganyisaso// mig gi 'dus taleg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba 'dus te rig pa'i 'du shes
ni gnas go// sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i 'du shes ni gas so lco'i 'dus rig pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'dus rig pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// yid kyi 'dus/
da rag pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ba du shes ni gnyis so// rnaba'i'adus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sna'i
'dus te rig pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba'i 'du shesazhi gnyis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'dus te 'gro ba'i rgyun gyis tshor pa'i 'du
nga bas ni gnyis go// yid kyi 'dus te'og pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba' 'du shes ni gnyis so/ sa'i khams kyi 'du shes na gnyis so// chu'i khams kyi'adu sa ni gnyis so//
khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rlung gi khams kyi 'du gsan gnyis so// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes na gnyis so//
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// marag pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du byed kya'idu shes naganyis so// rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// ming
dang gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyings so// skye mched drugag 'du shes ni gnyis so// rig pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba'i 'du shes naganyis so// srid pa'i 'du shes ni/
gnyis so/ len pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// srid pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// skya ba'i 'du shes ni gnas so// rga shi'i 'du shes ni gnas so// blang ba'i 'du shesan gzhis/
se dor ba'i 'du shesazhiganyis so// bsam gtan dang po'i 'du shes naganyis so// bsam gtan gnyis pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// bsam gtan gsum pa'i'adu shes ni
gnyis so// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i 'du shes na gnyis so// byams pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// snying rje'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// dga' ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// btang
snyoms kyi 'du shesan gnyis so// nam mkha'i mtha' yas su mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i'adu shes na gnyis so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i
bdu shes ni gnas so// cung zad med pa'i sku mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes niganyis so// 'du shes med 'du shes mdaman phyogs mchod kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni
gzhis so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'du shes na gnyis so// chos rjes su dran pa'i'adu shes niganyis so// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshul khrim+pa/
rjes su dran pa'i'adu shes na gnyis so// gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ lha rjes su dran pa'i ba dung shes na gnyis so// skyob rjes su dran
pa'i'adu shes ni gnyis so// dbugs phyind du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa'i
'gyi// bdu shasosgriganyis so// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shesan gnyis so// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyi 'du shesan gnyis so// bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shesan gnyis so//
chu sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shesan gnyis so// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shesani gnyis so/ bdag ga'idu shes kyi 'du shesan gnyis so// sems can rgyu 'du shes
kyi 'du shes na gnyis so/ srog gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes niganyis so// skya ba'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// gso ba ri da dung shas kyi 'du shesanIganyis so// skyes bu'i
'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ gong zag gi bdu shes kyi gdung shasan gnyis go// shed can gyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes gnyis sa// shad bdag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes na
gnyis so// byed pa po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba po'i gdu shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// shes pa po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes na gnyis so// mthong
ba po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// bde ba'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sdug ba'i 'du shesakyi 'du shes ni gnyis/
so badrag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis go// dran pa nye bar gzhigapa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// yang dag par spong ba'i 'du shes kyi'adu shes ni gnyis so//
