gi 'dus te reg pa na shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna' 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni
shan tu nam khar dag ba'o/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa na shan tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nAyashin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mag gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba na shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i
'dus te reg pa las khyung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
khani shin tu rnam par dag ba'o// sa'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chu'i khams ni shin tu rnam lar dag pa'o// ma'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rlung gi khams nishan/
rnam par dag pa'o// nam mkha'i (khamasanishin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ma rig pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du khyed ni shin
tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ming dang gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// skye mched drug ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// reg pon ngonan tu rnam par/
dag pa'o// tshor khan shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// srod pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// len pani shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// srid pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// skyo bani shani tu rnam
bar dag pa'o// rga shin shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tuphyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa nan tu rnam par dag pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pa'ol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ban shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag ba'o// phyi stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu

rnam par dag pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chen po stong pa nyidani shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyidani shin tu rnam par dag ba'o// 'dusakhyas stong
khanyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'dusamakhyas stong pa nyidanishin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyidani shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// thogam dang tha ma med pa stong pa
nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dor bamad pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyidan shin tu rnam par dgapa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par
dag pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyidani shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po med pa stongapa nyidanishin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
ngo bo nyid stongapa 'dan shin tunam bar dag pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidanAshin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yang
dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tunam par dgala'o// dbang po ldan shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// stobs ldani shin tu rnam par dag
ba'o byang chub kyi yan lag bdunani shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams na shin tu rnam par dag
pa'o bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshadamad pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
rnam par thar pa brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dgapa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgun shan rnam par dag pa'o// rnamapar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtsha namamed
ba dang/ smon pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mngon par shes ba rnams ni[‚Äú]shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams nishin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams n
shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ni
tu rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa chen bo ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// snying rje chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag
ba'o rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
dgra bcom nyid ni shin t+ta rnam par dag pa'o// rang byang chub napishin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams/
cad makhyen pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'abyor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnamA
[% ]la chos ston kyang/ sems ca na du ma dmigs so// byang chub mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pal/ de mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/
gzugs stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ 'du shes stong pa nyidama gnas pa'i tshul dang/ 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/
rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mgastong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rnab stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ sna stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lca stong
pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lus stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ yid stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ gzugs stong pa nyidami gnas pa'i tshul dang/ sgra stong pa nyid mi gnas
ba'i tshul dang/ dri stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ ro stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rog stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ chos stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/

ka mig gi rnam par shes ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ba nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang lce'i rnam
par shes pa stong pa nyidami gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi khe nas ba'i tshul dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mig gi 'dug
te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te ga pa stong pa nyid mi gnas ba'i tshul dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ba nyidami gnas pa'i tshul dang/ yid kyi 'dus rag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i phyir

gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ma gnas
pa'i tshul dang/ lca'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ yid kyi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ me'i khams
stong ba nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rlung gi khams stong ba nyidam gnas pa'i tshul dang// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas ba'i tshul dang/ rnam par shes
ba'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mag la stong pa nyid mi gnas ba'i tshul dang/ 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
tshul dang/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ tshor ba stong pa nyid mi
gnas pa'i tshul dang/ srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas ba'i tshul dang/ len kha stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ skyab stong pa nyid mi gnas

ba'i tshul dang/ rga shi stong pa de mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ tshul khrims kyipha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyidam gnas ba'i tshul/

b+hAts+tshA dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ba nyid mi gnas pa'i tshuladang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ba nyidam gnas pa'i tshul dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid

mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ phyi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ phyi nang stong pa
nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ chen po stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ 'dus byas/
stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa de mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid mi/
gnas pa'i tshul dang/ do khamed pa stong pa nyid me gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshuladang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyidami gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i/

tshul dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul/
dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa 'a tshul dang/ dbang po stong pa nyidam gnas pa'i tshul dang/ stobs stong pad mi gnas pa'i tshul dwang/ byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa
nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lagabargyud pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ bsam gtan stong pa
nyid mi gnas ba'i tshul dang/ tshad med ba stong pa nyid mi gnas ba'i tshul dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rnam par thar
sa pa stong pa nyid mi gnas ba'i tshul dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa'i jug pa stong ba nyidam gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa
chod pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
tshul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas

pa ba'i tshul dang/ byams pa chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco ba rgyud stong banyid mi gnas pa'i
tshul dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid ma gnas pa'i tshul dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'o bras bu stong pa nyid mi
gnas pa'i tshul dang/ dgrabcom pa nyid stong pa nyidam gnas pa'i tshul dang/ rang byang chub stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid m gnas ba'i tshul
dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ba nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ deni/
'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta rgyu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po mad pa la dngos po med pa ma gnas so// rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so// gzhan gyi dngos po la
gzhan gyi dngos bo ma gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de na 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang ngamigs su med pa de rig pa la'ang mi gnas so// rab 'abyor de ltar na byung
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ rang sangs
rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o// deci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas khacom ldan 'das de dag dang ( byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ rang sangs rgyas de dag dang/ nyan thos de dag gis kyang/ chos nyid derdzes su rtogs te/ chos nyid de rjes su rtogs pas kyang/ sems
can rnams la chos ston te/ de'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'dab 'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor chos kyidabyings ni 'da' ba med do// de bzhin nyid dang/
yang dgapa'i mtha'ana'ada' bamed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'irang bzhin med do/// shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyu
pa bam lo nyis brgya gya gcig pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la'ang
'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyidi dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' baamachisan ce lags/ 'o na gzugasakyang gzhan la/ chos kyidabyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyidakyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du shes kyang
gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan nag lags sam/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ dobazhin nyid
kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes par ng gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag ba'i mtha' lang gzhan/
[0]zhig lags sam/ mig kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'ang gzhan la// chos kyi//
dbyis kyang gzhan/ de bzhin 'di kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'ang gzhan l/ chos kyi rabyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin tu de kyang gzhan//
yang dag pa'i matha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyangs kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyidakyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhigalags sam/
lus kyang gzhan la/ cho sa kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyidakyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sgra'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dgapa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dre'ang gzhan la/ chos
kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ ro'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi rabyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
(mang da ga pa'i gza' yong gzhan zhig lags sam/ rig kyang gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang ga zhin/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
zhig lags sam/ chos kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ng
gzhan la/ chos kyi byings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang
lho dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang 'a/zhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags/
bsam lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes bal
khazhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhi gas sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'a'i dus te rig pa 'ang gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ der zhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhage lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhaganyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la nga gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg/
ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nye de kyang gzhan/ yang dag kha'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyang
kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gazhan/ de
khazhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gazhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la// chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
gzhan/ gang dag ba'i masha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin te de kyang gzhan/ yang dag
ba'i mtha' ya nga gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'i dus te rig ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gazhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
sa ba'imakha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba'ang gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sa'i
khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mthar yang gazhan zhigalags sam/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gazhan zhig lags sam/ ma'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyidabyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gazhan/ yang dag pa'i matha' yang
gzhan zhig lags sam/ rlung gi khams kyang gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i matha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams
kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyad gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khos kyang gzhan la/ chos kyidabyings kyang
gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ya nga gzhan zhig 'gas som/ ma rig pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan zhagi lags sam/ 'du byed kyang gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes
pa'i ng gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam//ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhigalags sam/ skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
yang gzhan zhigalags sam/ rig pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor babang gzhan la/
chos kyi dbyangs kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'o yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ srod pa'i ng gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyangs kyang gzhan// de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ len pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyangs kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag ba'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig la gas sam/

kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rga shi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'/
yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la// chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam// tshul khrig
kyipha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/chos
paN+NaM kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin/
nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bsam gtan gyilarol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gazhan zhig lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan l/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan / de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ gang
dag pa'i mthar yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal ba/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras
sh+tsa bu rnam par dgod pa bstan kyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ tha
snyadamadal ste/ 'di ltar ming bden pa dang/ gzugs bden pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ 'di'i mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog mdang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden te bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags
kyi don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skyabe thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras khu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i'abras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/
dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byoraci byis pa so so'i skye bo
rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/ don dam ba'i bden ba shes sam/ gal te shesanani de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgrakhacom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla nAmad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyuran/ rab 'khyer byis kha so so'i skya bo rnams
lam yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa'i ngamed/ lam bsgom pa'i ng med pas byis pa so so'i skye ba rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgodapa lta ga las 'ong/ rab 'byor 'bags pa'i gang zag
rnams lani lam yang yod/ lam bsgom pa'i ng yod pas na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
[7 ]@#// lam bsgom pas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bgyi bamachis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de nam yin te/ 'am bsgo/
las 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba med do/ rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/ lam gyis 'bras bu 'thob bar bya ba'ang med do// lam
ny+tsal ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen lo shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sem
can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod par byed do/ 'dus byas kyi khams samaM/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa khyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cinga' khris bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di na kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang
pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang/ gnod sems bsrubs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i chacan gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir
mi'o kha'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas ragra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci'ang rung ste/ na'akhyung pa'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i cha can du shes las
rang byung chu ba bo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spungs las yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub bo zhes gsungasan/ bcom ldan 'das ris su gcad cing 'dus
byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa mamachisan/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshamakhar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ba
'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras khu'am/ lanacigaphyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'cha/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyidadam/ rang byang chub bam/ blanamed pa yang dag par
rdzogasalo'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dusal byas ba yin/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/// bde bar gshegs pa don 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bcos/
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'on 'dus mkhyas kyi chos laris su gcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshogs kyikhu bam/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta sta/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan
gcig tu chub par gyur na/ de'i tshab dus byas sha 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes chos gang la'ang yas su gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta

ste nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong ba nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen kho stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pad dang/ 'dus/

ma byas stong ba nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyidedang/ rang bzhin stod pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyidadang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo/de stong pa nyid lta bar bzung ste/ samasacan
rnams la ris su gcad pas chos mi ston to// de bdagakyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i m/ bzod pa'i parol tu phyin pa kham/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'os/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/
bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje 'am dga' kha 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas
skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ cung zad med bab skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams sam/ ga nga dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang bo rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i bden kha rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam// tshadamed pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam
par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams sam/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma mo dpa dang/ smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa
rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzan rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sAm/
byams pa chen kho 'am/ snying rje chen bo 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i d dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid do// chos ga b.la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ gang la'ang chags pa med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs ba'i sprul pa sbyin pa yod/
su gtong yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i
don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo// tshul khrims srung ya nga tshul khrims kyi 'bras khulachags pached/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du nasems can thams
tsa cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo// bzod pa sgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ bzod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na
sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bul chags pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su
myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du brtson 'grus rtsomamo// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug kyang/ bsam gtan gyi'abras bu la//
zla chags pa med/ bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba medad/ gzhan dun sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'ajug go/ shesab
sgom yang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chagasapa med/ shesakhakyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du shes rab sgom
mo zag pa dang bcas bdang/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom yang zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ thog pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ thag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag batshad/
pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ thag chod pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// 'jig
rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jigaN+Din las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlakha'i don du 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom
mo 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang 'dusakhyas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras
bu3mas su myong bamed de/ gzhan dun sems can thamasacad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su sgom mo// rab 'byorade
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha/
rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pharel tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa dang/ chos thams cad l spyod de/ chos gang la'ang gnas pa 'am/
chags ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las/ mtshan dang dpe khyad
bzang bo mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drugacu bzhi'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya rgya
gnyis pa// danasatshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen posachos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'a byor sprul pa na 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la yongs
su spyod pa med do// bgal nyal ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa ched do// phyi nang gichos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med

rna bal yongs su spyod pa med do// sna la yongs su spyod pa med do// lce la yongs su spyod pa med do// lus la yongs su spyod pa med do// yid la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs

rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa medado// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa lo yongs su spyod pa med do// mag gi 'dusatereg pa la yod

'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba layongs su spyod pa med do// na
ba sum brgya kyi gsum 'bul

su spyod pa med do// phyi nang stong pa de la yongs su spyod pa med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongasasu spyod pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pamed do// don dmal stong
pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus mkhyas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
yongs su spyod padad// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// der bamed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su
spyod pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nying la yongs su spyod pa mad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// ma ramigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa
med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa skyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pamed do//
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod khamed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pamed
do dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
wA pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa medad/ tshad med pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med
do gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la
yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//
ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzungasakyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcul yongs su spyodab med do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi
la yongs su spyod pached do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod ba med do// byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do// snying rje chen bo la yongs su spyod pa mad do//
da sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med de// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa
med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la longs su spyod pa yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid la longs su spyod pa med do// rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyidil
yongs su spyod pached do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la los su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad l yongs su spyod
pa med do// rab 'byor da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyidir btu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dras sprul
pas lam bsgom pa la brtenakyang kun nas nyonamos pamed par yang m 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la// 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor banab nga ma gda' na/ lam bsgom du ci mchis/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byord ji snyam du sems/ dbazhin gshegs ba'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par
byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ban snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
spya/ gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos bo lal zhig la brtenate/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur
ba'i dngos po de lta bu 'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtog
ba yin no// gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta
bu lags/ma 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu la gas sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor gzug
thams cad na sprul pa lta bu 'o// tshor ba thams cad ni sprul ba lta bu 'o// 'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu 'o// 'du byed thams cad na sprul pa lta bu 'o// rnam par shes pa thams
cad n sprul pa lta bu 'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'dis de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul blta khu tshor bkrams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed
thams nyid sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ btsom ldan 'das sprul pa ni gzugs mamachis/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis/ 'du
khyedamams/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mos pa ma mchis rnam par byang ba'amachis/ gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'a 'khor ba mchis na/ ji
ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ba 'byor te ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsho/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtenanam/ lha 'am/ mi dag las yongs su grol bar
bya ba'i sems can khagang ya da dmigs sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang
chu ba sems dpa ba sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmagis so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyum
lta bur shes so// mthong ngo// rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo// rtogs so// gsolakha/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshalacinga mthong ste rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshalacing mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems

bar 'jug bzhi' spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod b.lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/

la spyod pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs lacu la spyod pa lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la
spyod pa lags/ soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen bol spyod pa lags/ snying rjechen gol spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod
waM pa lags/ deca'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyilam kyilaral spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang/ sems can rnams
longs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul bltakhur shesasu bananan/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/ rab 'abyor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams
cad sprul pa lta bur ming gis bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par b.rol tu phyin badrug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed
do sangs rgyas kyizhing ya nga yongs su dgakhar khyedade// ba 'byor gyis gsol kha/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta khu/ sgra brnyan ltakhu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mis
yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams tsi la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodacing
sems can rnams gyen du skyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsalal/ rab 'byor sems can rnams n zhingadang mtshan s yang dag ba ma yin par yongs su brtags kha la gnas
bsan/ byang chub sems dpa' sogs dbab chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod cing/ de dgamang dang mtshan ma las gyen du skyod do// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang la
mtshan mni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming zhes byakha 'am/ mtshan mazhes bya ba'odin glo bur gyi ming gi sgro btags pa'o// 'di lta ste/
ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya kha 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes shes bya ba'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par/
shes pa zhes khyab 'am/ bud med ces bya ba'am/ skyes bzhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba'am/ bu mo zhes bya kha bas/ sems can ramyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas shes
bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba bam/ lha zhes bya ba lam/ mazhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba bam/ rgyunadu zhugs pa'i
'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lanacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba bam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras khu zhes khyab 'am dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/ yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyuma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor ming ni thams cad ming gdon gyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i spyi khe rnams gang la chags pa
wA gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad n mde tsa ma ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pa'i cho/ thabs mkhas pas ming thams car ni
yongs su rtogs pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtag pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo tadikyis stong pa la khyedachags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong ra'amakhas pa rnams mngon
kabar zhen par mi byed do zhes skul ba khyed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhi po shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams
yachos ston pa yin no// rab 'abyo mtshan ma gang zhen/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skyo gas gang lachags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/
gzugs kyi mtshonam dang/ gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gangazhi na/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs ba dang/ daltar byang ba'i gzugs rags ba'am/ phra
kha 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa khas/ rgyang ring pa bam/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtogo sa bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya 'o/ rab 'byor
gzugs med pa'i mtshonam gang nyin/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas longs su brtags shing/ nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur bste/ 'di ni gzugs med
kha'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dbab sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tsho/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing/ mtshan
ma chod pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ nas kyang 'di'i mtshan ma'o// 'din mtshan ma med pa'o/ zhes khyab gnyis sum stong ba de ltar dgod cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bal spyod pa'i tsho/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol/
zhing mtshan ma mad pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas te ming dang mtshan
sgyu mar bas la/ btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das jiltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thobal/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs
par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams thegapa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsalal/ rab 'byor gal te dngos bo 'am/ dngosakho'i mchinam zhag yod na
ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/ khyad par thob par yang ma 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur
gyis 'di ltar dngos po'imtshan ma'ang med/ dngos kho'ang med pason/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi bal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mchin
ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan mamed
pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'itshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul/
gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par khyodado// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtanabazhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan mamed pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi yong
su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan mamed pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs khar khyedado// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nyer gzhag pa bzhi
yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed d// mtshan mamed pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
par byed do// mtshan mamed pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lta yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par khyedado// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshulakyis
nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa da/
yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma chod pa'i tshul gyis stong ba nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
do mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong bzhud yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'khos su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med
pa'itshul gyas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong bad yongs su rdzogs par khyed do// mtshan ma chad pa'i tshul
gyis thog ma dang thamamed pa stong pa nyid yongs surdzogs bar byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong panyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang
wa bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang gamtshan nyid stong pa
da yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan mamed pa'i tshul gyis mi dmags pa stong phad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan mamed pa'i tshul gyis dngos khomed pa sbyong padi bodas su

rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo 'di stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
do mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan mchod pa'i tshul gyis maN+Dal gyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do//

mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyidi dang/ mtshan ma med ba dang/ smon pa med pa yongs
su rdzogs par khyed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyisa mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs bar byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan m
med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis so so la nga dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan mched pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
ka @#// brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogasab byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ ba/

'byor gal te chung du na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam gyi khyon gcig gi mtshan ma yodan yang/ byang chub sems ba ba sems dpa' chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chos thams cad
mtshan ma med// dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pamed pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi
rgyu raro// rab 'abyor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med ba/ dran pa med// yid la bya ba med ba ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ya
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itsho/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don khyedado// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma
mchis shing/ dranapam mchis te/ yid la bgyi bam mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dgan mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
so 'di dag 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/ 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/ 'di dag ni
'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ 'did gnakun mod ga chos so// 'di dag ni thunamong ma yin pa'i chos so/ 'di dag kun thos kyi chos so// 'di dag na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni/
byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di d gnas ngas rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
mtshan mamad pa'i ngagazhanal/ nyan thos kyichos rnams kyang gzhan m/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sem//
mtshan mamed pa'i ng gzhan la/ rad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'i ng gzhan l/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'i ng
gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zham/gsog bcom ldan 'das de lta malags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan mamed pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu'o// lan cigaphyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyirami 'ong ba'i'abras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do/ rang byang chub go/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi
chos so// gsolal/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/'di ltar chos
thams cad mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos//

mang bos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam

@# gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin b dang/ nang stong ba nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyin ng stong ba nyid dang/ stod pa 'di stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don
sadam pa stong nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong nyidi dang/ 'dus ma byas stong ba ni dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med ba stong pa nyid

! dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmagasal stong ba nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo ba 'di stong ba nyid

cha dang dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nyi bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub
kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med ba bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnamakhar zur pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu dang/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ nan
bar shes pa ldadang/ ting 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag la rig pa bzhidang/
byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen bo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa bco brgyad dang/ de ma yin pa'i sas rgyas kyi chos dbag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de
ci'i phyir zhin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bosani stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshon de stong ba nyidan stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang
bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pan smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen bon phung bo lta la slob pa yin/ mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bcom brgyud la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byang ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis
la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ brtson
'grus kyi ba 'og tu phyin pa la slob ba yin/ bsam gtan gyipha rol tu phyin pa la slob ba yin/ nas lab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid

wA la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong ba nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stod pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid

ma[% ]la slob pa yin/ 'dusam byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mtha' las 'das ba stong pa de la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha mamed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa/

yin rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po mad pa skor

pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dranabanyebar gzhagapa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa
bzhe/Da 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtanabazhi la slob pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pabazhi la slob pa yin/ rnam
par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la slob pa
yin mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad l slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ mi
'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad la slob pa yin / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yane/ rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po
lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gags/
lha@#// rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skya ba dang/ gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so// de la ji ltar na gabru/
shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dba' na bu kha'i phung bo snying po med pa ltar/ shin tu gsong ldeng dang/ shin tu bsatshags dang/ shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar gzugs
wA shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhen/ gzugasan gang nas kyang 'ong ba modacing/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang du'angami
'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skyob dang 'jig pa shes pa yan no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin
zhi na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ma skya/ ma 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro bamod/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma lan te/ phyin ci
leg ma yin zhing/ de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar nagazugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhen/ 'di lta ste/
dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar n tshor ba'i skya ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhen/ tshor ban gang nas
nga 'ong med cing/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ong/ gang du'ang ma 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'i ngam song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar natsho/
ba'i skya ba dang ba jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar 'tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ngashes pa yanizhin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid na mi skye/ ma 'a gag/ 'ongobamed/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs
pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'dzul ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing/ de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar natshor ba'i
de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar n 'du shes shes pa yan zhin/ 'di lta ste/ dpar smig rgyul chu ni mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji
ltar na bdung shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig la shes pa yin zhen/ 'dushesani gang nas kyang 'ong ba medacing/ gong du'ang 'gro bamed pas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ong/ gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang
nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar n 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// jiltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhen/ 'du shes kyi ri
bzhin nyi dan mi skye/ mi ba gog/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin cilogo ma yin zhing/
[7]@#// de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// jiltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste sgo
dpar na chu shing shun pa so sor phyen snying po shin tumadamigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skyob dang 'dzag pa shes pa yin zhen/ 'du byed

@# nigang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing/ gang du'ang 'gro bamed pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang du'ang mi 'gro bsta/ gang gang nas kyang m 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed
kyi rgyab dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhen/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid/mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
@#yin rnam par byang bam yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel bam yin te/ phyin ci leg ma yin zhing/ de bzhin nyid du gnas bste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin/
wA nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul ba'od pung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa
shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhen/ rnam parishes pan gang nas kyang bong bamed cing/ gang du'ang 'gro bamed pas/ gang nasakyang mi 'ong/

gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du 'ang ma song bar bshis pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa 'i de bzhin/
nyid shes pa yin zhen/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid na mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas niyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri kham yin/'bal
ba ma yin te/ phyin ci logam yin zhing/ dbazhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched
rnams shes pa yin zhen/ nang gichos rnams nanang gi chos rnams kyis stong/ phyi'ichos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no//
ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhen/ mig ga khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// mig
gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig ga rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rnapa'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i

khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rna ba'i rnam par ngashes ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi'ang bzhin gyis stong ngo
dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lce'i khams kyang lca'i

khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo/ ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyirang bzhinagyis stong ngo// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lus kyi
khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo/ rigs khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyisastong ngo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams

kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stongango// yid kyi rnamakhar shes pa'i khams/
kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na//
cha rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye bamed par shes pa dang/ de bzhin du rtenacinga'abrel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang/ chad pa ma da pa dang/ rtag pa med pa dang/ don gcig pa la
yin pa dang/ don thadod pa ma yin pa dang/ 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'gro ba mad pa dang/ spros pa dang bral zhing zhi khar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cinga'abrel par 'byung ba shes ba yin
no ji ltar n 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhen/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ 'gog par 'gro/
ba'i lam 'phags pa'ibaden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdugabasngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhen/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'apag
pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'ibaden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun
'byung ba dang/ 'gagapa dang/ 'gog par 'grol3lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yanen// ji ltar na sdug bsngal
gyi do bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyidani ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung pa dang/ 'gogapa dang/ lam gyi de bzhin nyidakyang rab tu
shes pa yin/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni shes pa yin no// de nas tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag
de ltar 'tshalan/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor gal te chos kyi
dbyings sumagatogs pa'i chos la lazhig yodanani/ rnam par dkrug par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i tshos gzhan gang yang ma dmigs so// gal
tadamigasanani chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro// deci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam
de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so// de ltar mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no
zhes bya bar btags pa mdado// rab 'abyor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o//
rab 'byor gyisagasol la// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyingasal slob pas/ gangal bslab par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'abyor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur to/ deci'i phyir zhen/
rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad na chos kyi dbyings so// ga sol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/ bcom ldan 'dras/
kyis bka' stsalar/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi drabyas ni de bzhin
du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de'i/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang/ ma dag pa'i chos dang/ 'jig rten ba dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang/
zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ thog ba med pa'i chos dang/ ban ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshes dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams
cad chos kyi dbyings te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la slob pasachos thams cad la bslabA
par 'gyura'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyangs gsan/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin b la
spyod pas/ jiltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji
ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ jiltar khams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab khar bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin/
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab khar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khri stongapa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa dal bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong ba nyid stong ba nyid la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar donadam kha stong pa nyid la bslab parlabagyi/ ji ltar 'a dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong
sh+tsa pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la khaslab par bgyi ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba med
ko ba stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong
ba nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ma demags pa stong pa nyidil bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa stong ba nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong
ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhil bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar byung chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'o phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab
par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhil bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhal
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnamakhar thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mngon par shes ba drug la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzan thams cad la/
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ga zungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'jigs pa bzhi la
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar so sayang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' bache kho
ts+tshA la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud la bslab par bgyi/ jiltar min na kho 'amtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/

dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cu yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mthoba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye

kha pa bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyib la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sum
cu rtsa gsum kyilhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshoma'i ltar skyabar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi bal bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phrul dga'i
lhar skyabar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ jaltar tshas ris kyi lhar skyabar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs

lhanye phan gyi lhar skye kar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar khagyi bal bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar

snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skyobar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshadamed snang ba'ilhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang

ba'i lhar skyabar bgyi ba la paslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba'akhaslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung dge'alhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshadamad dge ba'i lhar skye/

bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar che ba'i lhar skya bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung che'u lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
par bgyi/ jiltar tshad medache'ilhar spyi bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'bras bu che bab lhar skyekhar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ jiltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i
slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyilhar skye bar bgyib la bslabacing der yang ma skyabar bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la
bslab cing der yang mi skye par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang ma skyo bar bgyi/ ji ltar cung zad med pa'i sku mched kyi lhar skye bar
bgyi ba la bsrub cing der yang mi skyo bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi bal bslab cing der yang masal brgya
sa mas dang bo bas da ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems baskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems
pa/ bskyod pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ jiltar sems bskyod pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bstod pa bdun pa la
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems kha skyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi
ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi rjeltar sems can yong
su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing longs su dag par bgyikhal bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslab cing/ chos thams cad rnam la
thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bsgrub par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par
bgyi mgi labaslab par bgyi/ rnapa la bslab par bgyi/ sna la bslab par bagyi/ lcal bslabapar bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgya/ gzugs la
bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab par bgyi/ dra la bslab par bgyi// rol bslab par bgyi/ rig la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la
bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la
bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te regapa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ ma ga gi 'dus te reg pa'i skyon
gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te rigapa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba la bslab/
par khagyi/ sa'i khams la bslab khar bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ ma'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khamasal bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khamasal
bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par khagyi/ ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed 'khaslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ming
gzugasalabaslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug labaslab par bgyi/ rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab
par bgyi/ srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shal bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la bslab par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtanakyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslabakar bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyin ng stong ba 'di la bslab par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong
[d]pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus mkhyas stong pa/
nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la pa slob par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong b rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkangapa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab/
par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadang la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags
ba'i bdenapa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab
par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyadal ba slob par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la khaslab par bgyi/ gzus kyi sgo rnams la
bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byams pa
chan bo la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab bar bgyi/ lan
cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bul bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub labaslab par bgyi/ lam gyi
rnam po shes pa nyidel bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ci log la
! spyod pa'i m/ mi sbyo ba spros bar bgyid bar mi 'gyur lags grang//
